item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @unleashed_pvp unleashed pvp
item.description:
@unleashed_pvp wrote:

This maybe a quick job but I need help with my actionhandler. when I compile my server it says

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1457: cannot find symbol symbol : method getPA() location: class server.model.players.ActionHandler getPA().sendFrame126("Choose the stat you wish to reset!", 2810) ; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Then I found where it was but I don’t know what to do! If some one can correct it for me I’ll Rep++ Them!

public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) { c.clickNpcType = 0; c.npcClickIndex = 0; switch (npcType) { case 409: c.getPA().showInterface(2808); getPA().sendFrame126("Choose the stat you wish to reset", 2810); c.sendMessage("Which stat would you like to reset?"); break;

Read full topic
